pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Normal Distribution // Calculates and differentiates probabilities and density of (conditional) multivariate normal distribution and Gaussian copula (with various marginal distributions) using methods described in A. Genz (2004) doi:10.1023/B:STCO.0000035304.20635.31, A. Genz, F. Bretz (2009) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-01689-9 and E. Kossova, B. Potanin (2018) https:ideas.repec.org/a/ris/apltrx/0346.html.
